data.prayer: Please, convict the 4,858 believers in Sipahijala, Tripura, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sipahijala, Tripura, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Sipahijala.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 35 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sipahijala, Tripura, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Sipahijala unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Sipahijala, Tripura, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Sipahijala, Tripura, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Sipahijala to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sipahijala, Tripura, India has a population of 441,600.

We estimate Sipahijala has 4,858 people who might know Jesus, 5,358 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 431,384 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Sipahijala, Tripura, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
